item.description: This post will derive an optimal Wordle-specific guessing strategy. The approach taken will be reducing the set of possible words a maximum amount for each guess; however, it doesn’t make sense to keep reducing the set of words until the final guess, so we’re reintroduced to our old friend, the explore-exploit tradeoff.
